item.title: Actiontimer error? please help!
item.dc:creator: @FromAutumnToAshes FromAutumnToAshes
item.description:
@FromAutumnToAshes wrote:

Sup guys, im trying to make a actiontimer so no one uses this thing over and over again on the source (Pk Planet) but im getting the following error:

client.java:15152: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class client if (actionTimer == 0) { ^ client.java:15158: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class client actionTimer = 6; ^ 2 errors

Here is my code:

if(objectID == 2038){ if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP(100, 0); addSkillXP(100, 2); addSkillXP(100, 3); actionTimer = 6; } }

Read full topic
